class.name: WeightedObservedPoint

javadoc.text:
This class is a simple container for weighted observed point in{@link CurveFitter curve fitting}. *

Instances of this class are guaranteed to be immutable.
Weight of the measurement in the fitting process.
Observed value of the function at x.

javadoc.param: weight weight of the measurement in the fitting process

javadoc.text: Get the weight of the measurement in the fitting process.
javadoc.return: weight of the measurement in the fitting process

javadoc.text: Get the abscissa of the point.
Get the observed value of the function at x.
javadoc.return: observed value of the function at x
